name: Hunt For The Cookie Dealer
description:
A kind of stupid visual novel about two strangers who've fallen into the underworld and get roped into a lot of wacky situations on a search for the owner of their local bakery.

☆☆ About us ☆☆

Hello! We're just three friends that wanted to try out game development. This is our first time trying anything like this, and it was a lot of fun :)

Please do let us know what you think! Feedback appreciated <3

☆☆ About the game ☆☆
  • A semi-interactive visual novel type game
  • Defies logic sometimes a lot
  • Approximately half an hour of fun!
  • Three endings! (sorta)
☆☆ Credits ☆☆
  • Built in Ren'py
  • The three of us have done all art, coding, and writing
  • Music credits:
    • Event Horizon - Jack Kennedy
    • Fridge Broke (Instrumental) - Beekwilder
    • Blazer Rail 2 - https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/blazer-rail-2/
    • Bounce - alfredo
    • Choices - Reggie San Miguel
    • Home - VALENTINE
